Question: Why would you take a bus to work?
Options: A. commute B. flying C. get somewhere D. travel E. go home

I would take a bus to work because it provides an easy and inexpensive way to commute, particularly for those who live in remote areas or for whom owning a car is not practical. It also allows me to travel on a schedule and avoid traffic congestion. In contrast, flying requires additional costs and time, and can be disrupted by weather conditions or air traffic control issues. It is also more time-consuming and inconvenient for those who need to travel long distances. Therefore, the answer is A. commute.
